items.title: Bay Area Health Officers reaffirm support for full in-person school
items.summary: As Bay Area Health Officials, we are excited that more than a million Kindergarten-12th grade students are returning to school for in-person learning this fall across the wider San Francisco Bay Area.

items.title: SF offers third dose of Pfizer or Moderna vaccines to immunocompromised people
items.summary: A third dose of the Pfizer and Moderna series is offered to people with certain medical conditions based on guidance from federal and state health authorities.

items.title: SF to require proof of vaccination for entry to certain indoor businesses and all large indoor events
items.summary: All restaurants, bars, clubs, gyms and large indoor events will be required to obtain proof of vaccination from patrons and employees to protect against the continued spread of COVID-19.
